Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championship KZ / KZ2
programme.desc: The last FIA Karting event of the season will take place in Portugal. The Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Championship - KZ will see the discipline’s top drivers battle it out alongside participants in the FIA Karting World Cup - KZ2 and the Int. Masters Super Cup.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurf World Tour Brazilian Special
programme.desc: The GKA Kitesurf World Tour 2024 will feature three spectacular stops in Brazil, highlighting the nation’s premier kitesurfing destinations. With top riders battling for championship titles, the 2024 season is set to deliver unforgettable action for fans worldwide.

programme.title: Skoda Titan Desert Series - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: In today´s episode the Titan Desert 2024 in NEOM, Saudi Arabia, challenges mountain bikers with intense desert terrains, combining endurance, competition, and stunning landscapes in a unique event showcasing one of the world’s most innovative regions.

programme.title: Nendaz Backcountry Invitational
programme.desc: The Nendaz Backcountry Invitational 2024 promises to be an adrenaline-packed showcase of the world’s top freeride skiers and snowboarders, set against the stunning backdrop of Nendaz’s pristine alpine terrain.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: Episode 24
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 24

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: Mbuzi Dume - Strong Goat - Kilimandscharo (TZN)
programme.desc: Tom Belz was faced with the challenge of his life: The 31-year-old goes through life with one leg and two crutches and then climbs the highest mountain in Africa. He also wants to encourage others with his own story.

programme.title: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Vendée Globe 2024 - 52min HL (Sailing, Mitte Februar) – International + DACH
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe wants to use the media impact of the event to raise public awareness of ocean protection during the circumnavigation. By sailing around the world, the Vendée Globe sailors are drawing attention to the fragility of our oceans.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals - Freestyle Ski and Snowboard
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode gibt es die volle Dosis Freestyle Snowboarding und Skiing. Junge talentierte Athleten aus der ganzen Welt können bei den World Rookie Finals 2023 ihr Können unter Beweis stellen. Schauen wir uns das mal an!

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 2

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Wrestling continues to be an interal part of Dean's life, and he finds the most satisfaction in helping athletes to understand and fall in love with the sport, as he did.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Jaclyn Madarasz as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: CJ Hollett is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Black Belt who loves teaching his craft. He is very well respected as an MMA coach for his technical mindset, high level skills and experience coaching UFC fighters. CJ loves working with MMA fighters because of their hunger to win, and believes it's time for Jiu Jitsu to make a resurgence in the MMA cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Josh Lee is highly respected in the MMA community for his wrestling skills. In this episode, we follow Josh throughout his day, and see some well known HK fighters who have trained under him, such as Jess Elverum. It is Josh's hope that his ability to transfer his knowledge of wrestling will make big difference in his students' fighting. He would also love to see more people take up wrestling.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E60 Jodha Akbar S2 E60
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: 1920 London
programme.desc: Shivangi lives in London with her husband Veer Singh. One day, he receives a gift from Rajasthan. From then, strange things happen with Veer and his condition deteriorates. Shivangi, thinking that this is because of black magic, goes to Rajasthan and finds Jai, an exorcist and begs him for help. Jai agrees to help Shivangi save her possessed husband from the evil spirit.

programme.title: Pawnee
programme.desc: Blada Strzała, biały mężczyzna wychowany przez wodza Pawnee, zostaje wysłany do białych osadników, gdy ci wkraczają na ziemie plemienia. Przyjmuje imię Paul Fletcher i zostaje zwiadowcą taborów. Po śmierci wodza, Szalony Lis przejmuje władzę i prowadzi Pawnee do ataku na osadników, mimo dążenia do pokoju.

programme.title: I Rzekł Pan do Kaina
programme.desc: Mężczyzna mści się na rodzinie, przez którą został niesłusznie skazany na dziesięć lat ciężkich robót.

programme.title: Czas Masakry
programme.desc: Poszukiwacz złota i jego wiecznie pijany przyrodni brat muszą walczyć z ranczerem i jego sadystycznym synem po tym, jak ci przejmują kontrolę nad ich farmą.

programme.title: Zbuntowany Rewolwerowiec
programme.desc: Mężczyzna szkoli się, żeby stać się najlepszym strzelcem Zachodu i pozbyć się gangu zabójców, którzy zamordowali jego rodziców.

programme.title: Podwójny Judasz
programme.desc: Luke Barret traci pamięć w wyniku urazu głowy, którego doznał podczas strzelaniny. Próbując odnaleźć człowieka, który chciał go zabić, Luk odkryje straszną prawdę o swojej rodzinie, a także, że sam był płatnym rewolwerowcem.

programme.title: Pojedynek w Durango
programme.desc: Dan Tomlinson, znany kiedyś jako Will Sabre, próbuje zerwać z przeszłością, ale jego były gang chce go zmusić do powrotu. Po drodze spotyka osieroconego chłopca i zaczyna pracę w banku. Gdy dochodzi do napadu, Dan zostaje oskarżony o współpracę z przestępcami i musi oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Siedem Rewolwerów, Jedna Masakra
programme.desc: Mężczyzna zostaje aresztowany, osądzony i skazany za napad, który w rzeczywistości popełnił ktoś inny.

programme.title: Bóg Jest Moim Coltem
programme.desc: Wysłannik armii działając pod przykrywką ma oczyścić skorumpowane Langford City z meksykańskich bandytów.

programme.title: Dolina Zemsty
programme.desc: Synowie barona bydła z Kolorado, jeden biologiczny, a drugi adoptowany, żywią do siebie urazę i walczą o kontrolę nad imperium ojca.

programme.title: Masakra w Dragoon Wells
programme.desc: Oficer kawalerii, jedyny ocalały z ataku Indian, wraz z wagonem więźniów przemierza wrogie tereny indiańskie.

programme.title: Bronię Się Przed Wrogami
programme.desc: Kilka osób poszukuje trzech jednodolarowych monet, na których wybite są informacje, gdzie jest zakopany skarb.

programme.title: Dolary Dla McGregorów
programme.desc: Niejaki Forsythe, łowca głów, używa swojej żony jako przynęty na bandytów. Jeden numer się nie udaje i jego żona ginie. Forsythe wyrusza w pościg za mordercą, ale do pogoni dołącza tajemniczy jeździec...

programme.title: Kid, Postrach Zachodu
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri jako Kid Terror O'Hara, przywódca grupy dzieci, które w opuszczonym miasteczku Torque, bawią się w kowbojskie życie.

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie
programme.desc: Właścicielka sklepu angażuje się w walkę z korupcją w swoim mieście, Ma także nadzieję przyciągnąć uwagę przystojnego nowego szeryfa.

programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: Młody zastępca próbuje otrzeźwić i ożywić spłukanego szeryfa-alkoholika, aby rozprawić się z walczącymi ze sobą gangami przestępców na Dzikim Zachodzie.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Strzelaj Gringo... Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Meksykański właściciel ziemski Gutierrez oferuje uratowanie zbiegłego banity Chada Starka przed powieszeniem, jeśli Stark zgodzi się odnaleźć i zwrócić zbiegłego syna Gutierreza, Fidela. Stark wkrótce odnajduje Fidela, który przyłączył się do bandy banitów prowadzonej przez byłego znajomego Starka, Charliego Doneghana, nazywającego siebie teraz "Majorem".

programme.title: Zwali go King
programme.desc: Łowca nagród tropi bezwzględny gang handlarzy bronią przez granicę z Meksykiem.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Wojownik z równin
programme.desc: Jim Dancer, były bandyta, staje się szeryfem w Kansas, próbując zacząć nowe życie. Po tragicznych wydarzeniach z przeszłości, przyjmuje tożsamość detektywa Cummingsa. Jako szeryf walczy z przestępczością i korupcją w miasteczku, jednocześnie stawiając czoła zemście Berta Slocuma, brata zabitego przez niego mężczyzny.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Łowcy kłopotów
programme.desc: Dwaj skłóceni bracia, którzy nie rozmawiają ze sobą, postanawiają spędzić Boże Narodzenie z matką. Kobieta, mająca nadzieję na ich pojednanie, stara się połączyć rodzinę w ten wyjątkowy czas. Choć ich spotkanie nie jest łatwe, matka nie rezygnuje z próby przywrócenia harmonii i miłości w rodzinie.

programme.title: Skalpy
programme.desc: Dowódca teksańskiego fortu w czasie wojny secesyjnej odmawia poddania się żołnierzom Unii. Próbuje on kupić córkę wodza miejscowego plemienia Indian. Wódz odmawia, a konfederaci wyrzynają plemię i porywają młodą Indiankę. Dziewczynie udaje się uciec. Ukrywa się u ranczera, który nie lubi Indian, ale jeszcze bardziej nienawidzi konfederatów. Ta dziwna para łączy siły, by dokonać ostatecznej zemsty na południowcach.

programme.title: Pełzająca Śmierć
programme.desc: Agent federalny Alan Fields, pod przykrywką Jonathana Pinkertona, pracownika Lloyds of London, prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie napadu na bank, w którym jeden z trzech złodziei zabił dwóch pozostałych, aby wejść w posiadanie wszystkich pieniędzy.

programme.title: Święta Trójca i Czterej Rewolwerowcy
programme.desc: Święta Trójca i Czterej Rewolwerowcy. Handel bronią z Indianami z jednej strony i przejmowanie kopalni złota z drugiej to główne zainteresowania Quina i Gomeza, bardzo podejrzanych gości w gospodzie Papy Martineza.

programme.title: Ślepa Nienawiść
programme.desc: Kiedy w miasteczku zostaje zamordowany indiański wódz, sympatyzujący z nim były szeryf próbuje powstrzymać Indian przed zemstą.

programme.title: Fuzzy Bohater
programme.desc: Fuzzy i Shoshena przybywają do małego miasteczka Chedron z zamiarem obrabowania lokalnego banku, którego właściciel, De Koven, próbuje przejąć hipoteki wszystkich farmerów w okolicy.

programme.title: Gdzie Śmierć Zbiera Żniwo
programme.desc: Dwie nienawidzące się rodziny od zawsze spędzają czas na wzajemnym zabijaniu się. Córka z rodziny Campos i syn z rodziny Mounter zakochują się w sobie - końca nienawiści nie widać.

programme.title: Przyjacielu, Spoczywaj w Pokoju!
programme.desc: Oficer Dove Williams ściga grupę banitów, którzy obrabowali dyliżans w Teksasie.

programme.title: Na samotnej drodze
programme.desc: Weteran Johnny Rush wraca do domu, by odkryć, że jego ranczo zostało skonfiskowane przez barona bydła. Dowiaduje się, że jego dziewczyna jest zaręczona z baronem, aby ratować finansowo zagrożone ranczo jej ojca. Po utracie ręki w walce z poplecznikami barona, Rush zaczyna używać łuku, by pomścić swoje straty.

programme.title: Wspaniały Teksan
programme.desc: Glenn Saxon, Barbara Loy, Massimo Serato, Gloria Osuna.El Desperado (Glenn Saxon) jest twardym, sprawnie władającym rewolwerem właścicielem saloonu, który pomaga meksykańskim chłopom przeciwstawić się okrutnie uciskającemu ich latyfundyście.

programme.title: Znajdź Miejsce W Którym Możesz Umrzeć
programme.desc: Wyrzutek, żołnierz Konfederacji, odkupuje swoje winy broniąc kobiety przed bandytami, którzy są gotowi ją zabić dla kopalni złota.

programme.title: Dla Przyjaciela Wszystko
programme.desc: Dwóch kowbojów zostaje okradzionych ze złota w skalistych górach i postanawiają walczyć z bandytami. "Anything for a Friend" (1972) to komediowy Italo-Western autorstwa Demofilo Fidaniego, który po raz pierwszy został pokazany przez telewizję w Niemczech.

programme.title: Ścigany
programme.desc: W małym miasteczku miejscowy szeryf zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i zmuszony do ucieczki.

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu
programme.desc: Ważny skok idzie źle, gdy dwaj młodzi mężczyźni stają na drodze meksykańskich bandytów i złego, skorumpowanego biznesmena. Ci będą chcieli odzyskać skradziony łup.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Najlepszy z Siedmiu
programme.desc: Jonnie Stapleton w swoim debiutanckim filmie daje komediowy popis wirtuozerii grając jednocześnie siedem wersji samego siebie.

programme.title: Mój pierwszy cud
programme.desc: Film opowiada historię Angeliki, 16-letniej dziewczyny, która walczy z rzadką chorobą nowotworową - zespołem mielodysplastycznym. Film opowiada o próbie prowadzenia normalnego życia i szukaniu nadziei na znalezienie pierwszej prawdziwej miłości, zanim będzie za późno.

programme.title: Pokaż Się
programme.desc: Przyszedł, żeby pogodzić się ze stratą. Coś nie chce mu na to pozwolić.

programme.title: Bezpański Anioł
programme.desc: Intensywny, oszałamiający wręcz thriller, który zabierze nas w świat morderców do wynajęcia.

programme.title: Szukając Nadziei
programme.desc: O Hope, młodej kobiecie zmagającej się z częściową amnezją i Andrew, jej mężu obsesyjnie skupionym na pracy, który musi rozkochać Hope w sobie na nowo. Czy Andrew pogodzi się z przeznaczeniem?

programme.title: Rozstępy
programme.desc: Po śmierci ojca, Lyle Bennett wyrusza w ekstremalną podróż utraty wagi w nadziei osiągnięcia zdrowia i szczęścia. Jego cel będzie pchać go poza jego fizyczne granice i przetestować siłę jego psychicznej i emocjonalnej stabilności.

programme.title: Beach Love
programme.desc: Zmuszony do opieki nad młodszą siostrą po stracie obojga rodziców, szesnastolatek trafia do zagranicznego miasteczka surfingowego z prawie zniedołężniałymi dziadkami, ale szybko znajduje ukojenie w fantazjach o pin-up girl i wyrusza, by ją odnaleźć. Wyruszając w drogę kradzionym samochodem z nieproszonym gościem, jego poszukiwania prowadzą do wielu wyzwań, samopoznania i, co zaskakujące, nowej miłości." Written By Melanie McAvoy.

programme.title: Chłopak z Przedmieścia
programme.desc: Niedawny absolwent college'u pogrążony w depresji musi zdecydować, czy będzie realizować swoją pasję, czy trzymać się ochronnej bańki życia w małym miasteczku.

programme.title: Darowany koń
programme.desc: Po stracie matki Amanda pracuje na ranczu biznesmena. Gdy jego córka odrzuca nowego konia, dziewczyna postanawia go trenować. Odkrywając talent Misty, odzyskuje nadzieję i radość.

programme.title: Kod wieczności
programme.desc: Po dokonaniu rewolucyjnego wynalazku o wielkich konsekwencjach, Bridget odkrywa wady firmy, z którą współpracowała nad prototypem fontanny młodości. Kiedy zrywa umowę i odchodzi, szybko zdaje sobie sprawę, że firma nie cofnie się przed niczym, żeby ją odzyskać. Rodzina Bridget zostaje porwana, żeby wymusić korzystne głosowanie. Cała nadzieja zostaje w nastoletniej córce Bridget Mirandzie i jej sojusznikach: Corey’m (weteranie wojskowym z problemami) i Stephanie (prostytutce).

programme.title: Droga ucieczki
programme.desc: Dziesięciu pasażerów autobusu utknęło na złomowisku po tym, jak zostali zepchnięci z drogi przez gang motocyklistów. Aby przetrwać, muszą zaimprowizować broń i znaleźć w sobie odwagę, by bronić się przed zabójcami.

programme.title: Obcy Kontra Obcy
programme.desc: Sześcioro przyjaciół z college'u wplątuje się w zabawę w kotka i myszkę z rasą stworzeń, które mogą przekształcania się w cokolwiek, z czego pobrały DNA.

programme.title: Księżna z Cancun
programme.desc: Mężczyzna wciąż zakochany w swojej byłej dziewczynie zgadza się pojechać z nią do Cancun, gdzie spotyka miejscową dziewczynę - co zmusza go do zakwestionowania wszystkiego, czego chce w życiu.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Pociąg do Edynburg
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes eskortuje legendarny diament Gwiazda Rodezji pociągiem do Edynburga. Mimo zabezpieczeń, klejnot znika, a syn właścicielki zostaje zamordowany. Holmes, Watson i inspektor Lestrade ruszają tropem zbrodni, prowadzącym do pułkownika Morana – człowieka związanego z Moriartym.

programme.title: Młodzi Poszukiwacze
programme.desc: Akcja filmu rozgrywa się w roku 1893 roku na amerykańskim zachodzie. Marcus O'Rileya (Riley) i jego wspólnik The Magician (Magik) są wolnymi strzelcami wyspecjalizowanymi w odzyskiwaniu ludowych przedmiotów.

programme.title: Pocałunek Lady X
programme.desc: Zhańbiony były tajny agent ryzykuje swoje życie, a także życie swojej ragtagowej drużyny, gdy szuka zemsty na charyzmatycznym terroryście, który zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Rozdział 27
programme.desc: Film o Marku Davidzie Chapmanie w dniach poprzedzających niesławne morderstwo Beatlesa Johna Lennona.

programme.title: Odzyskując Przyjaźń
programme.desc: Dlaczego bezwzględnego biznesmena miałaby nagle interesować przyjaźń? Być może po to, by odzyskać coś, o czym nigdy nie wiedział, że to stracił?

programme.title: Szansa na życie
programme.desc: Steve trafia do brutalnej rodziny zastępczej, gdzie przez lata doświadcza przemocy. W poszukiwaniu prawdziwej tożsamości zaczyna szukać swoich biologicznych rodziców. System go zawodzi, a nazwisko Klakowicz skrywa tajemnicę. To niezwykła historia o sile, wytrwałości i dążeniu do prawdy.

programme.title: Zemsta Lizzie Borden
programme.desc: Około 120 lat po tym, jak najsłynniejsza amerykańska morderczyni Lizzie Borden zabiła tam swoich rodziców, grupa studentek wprowadziła się do kwatery w starej posiadłości w Nowej Anglii, aby urządzić piżama party.

programme.title: Ostatni Płatny Zabójca
programme.desc: Starzejący się płatny zabójca, Harry, właśnie spartaczył robotę i jest teraz celem. Jego córka również zajmuje się zawodowo zabójstwem i teraz również jest celem.

programme.title: Chelsea
programme.desc: Kiedy najlepsza przyjaciółka Chelsea, Laura, zaręcza się i wyprowadza z ich mieszkania, zostaje jej coś więcej niż tylko pusty pokój.

programme.title: Szlakiem Skarbów Patagonii
programme.desc: Współczesny western rozgrywający się na niestabilnych ekologicznie i politycznie terenach południowej Arizony.

programme.title: Kongresmen
programme.desc: Zdeterminowany kongresmen, niezrażony polityczną zdradą, zaciekłym atakiem mediów i niedawnym rozwodem, stara się zachować godność i chronić małą wioskę rybacką przed korupcją.

programme.title: Psi opiekun
programme.desc: Psychopatyczny prześladowca zmusza emerytowanego dziennikarza śledczego do rozwiązania przerażającej zagadki.

programme.title: Stwór w Lesie
programme.desc: Trzech byłych studentów filmowych University of Delaware jedzie do Hobgood w Karolinie Północnej, aby nakręcić dokument o przetrwaniu w nadmorskich lasach.

programme.title: Wszystko w Swoim Czasie
programme.desc: Charlie rzuca pracę i przenosi się do domu, by kierować zespołem rockowym z rodzinnego miasta. Jego wspierająca dziewczyna podziela jego miłość do zespołu, aż do momentu, gdy walka w zespole zmusza ich do dokonania wyborów, które na zawsze wpłyną na ich życie.

programme.title: Półtorej Godziny
programme.desc: Jedno, długie ujęcie bez cięć o życiu Any, która ma córkę, niedawno się rozwiodła i rozpoczęła związek, ale nie chce, żeby ktoś się o nim dowiedział.

programme.title: Czarny Łabędź
programme.desc: Osławiony pirat Henry Morgan zostaje gubernatorem Jamajki. Wzywa dawnych towarzyszy do walki z korsarzami, by uwolnić Karaiby. Kiedy jeden z nich porywa córkę poprzedniego gubernatora, wojna na śmierć i życie staje się nieunikniona. Morgan zmaga się także z uczuciami do pięknej arystokratki.

programme.title: Goliat i grzechy Babilonu
programme.desc: Goliat staje do walki o wolność Babilończyków, mierząc się z tyranią i zdradą. Bogata scenografia, widowiskowe sceny akcji i charyzmatyczny Mark Forest nadają filmowi wyjątkowy klimat. Zręczna reżyseria i humor w stylu dawnych epopei dodają uroku tej klasycznej produkcji peplum.

programme.title: Gdybyś Tylko Wiedział
programme.desc: Jest to historia Louise, projektantki mody, u której w młodym wieku rozwija się Alzheimer, prawdopodobnie dlatego, że za młodu była maltretowana przez swojego chłopaka.

programme.title: Gęsto
programme.desc: To opowieść o wschodzącej magnatce nieruchomości THERESIE JAMES, która dla dodatkowych korzyści finansowych prowadzi w swojej dzielnicy nielegalne interesy.

programme.title: Teksańska bawełna
programme.desc: Doświadczony stróż prawa wierzy, że aresztowany nieznajomy jest niewinny. Gdy zaczyna drążyć sprawę, odkrywa tajemnice, które na zawsze zmienią jego miasteczko.

programme.title: Falsyfikat
programme.desc: Daniel Jakor jest jednym z najbardziej płodnych i odnoszących sukcesy artystów, o jakich świat nigdy nie słyszał. Walcząc o sprzedaż własnej sztuki, wkrótce odkrywa, że jego prawdziwy geniusz nie polega na tworzeniu własnych dzieł, ale na fałszowaniu wielkich mistrzów, którzy przyszli przed nim.

programme.title: Powstanie Izydy: Klątwa Mumii
programme.desc: Studenci archeologii muszą połączyć siły, aby zapobiec powstaniu z martwych egipskiej armii bogini Izydy.

programme.title: Miliony
programme.desc: Historia sześciu dwudziestoparoletnich Azjatów: Brandona (Marzyciel), Derona (Czarna Owca), Mary (Tomboy), Charliego (Cynik), Jaya (Playboy) i Eddiego (Mózg).

programme.title: Wpływ
programme.desc: Influence to historia pierwszej randki dwojga autystycznych nastolatków, którzy z pomocą rodziców komunikują się głównie poprzez literowanie na tablicy literowej, która jest formą komunikacji wspomaganej.

programme.title: Źli Ludzie
programme.desc: Dziwna i inteligentna czarna komedia, pełna s*xu, przemocy, brudnej polityki i sławy, BAD PEOPLE to przezabawna opowieść, która przypomina nam, że każdy z nas ma swoją ciemną stronę!

programme.title: Czarna magia
programme.desc: Detektyw Charlie Chan odwleka powrót do Honolulu, by rozwiązać zagadkę morderstwa wśród spirytystów. Po śmierci Williama Bonnera podczas seansu spirytystycznego jego córka Frances staje się podejrzaną. W śledztwie pojawia się więcej tajemnic, a hipnoza i samobójstwo tylko komplikują sprawę.

programme.title: Zabójstwo Niewinności
programme.desc: Nowy pastor dowiaduje się, jak ważne jest zapewnienie stabilności, uzdrowienia i nadziei po tym, jak podwójne zabójstwo wstrząsa jego społecznością.

programme.title: Brutalna Rzeczywistość
programme.desc: Wyszkolony przez FBI neuropsycholog łączy siły ze złodziejką, by znaleźć urządzenie zmieniające rzeczywistość, podczas gdy jej szalony były szef próbuje ich schwytać.

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Carolyn Craig, Ewing Mitchell, and Myron Healey. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a range war over water seems inevitable. A masked man dressed as Robin Hood tries to help the homesteaders by knocking down the ranchers fences. Things seem to be going well until a similarly dressed imposter robs the Diablo bank.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho aid a poor man who gets caught up in a cattle rustling operation. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. programme.title: Cisco Kid
